price: Têm as alvíssaras, na vida terrena e na Derradeira Vida. - Não há alteração das palavras de Allah. - Esse é o magnífico triunfo.
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
